sentence.idiomatic: Yesterday I went to bed too late. I've been yawning all day because of it.
During the meeting he was yawning non-stop.
How come you're yawning again? Is the movie boring?
He is a night owl, he goes to bed very late every day.

word.literal: to go drinking at a bar

sentence.idiomatic: That group of my friends, every one of them is a night owl. They frequently go to bars.
I'm already accustomed to the night owl lifestyle. I can't go to sleep this early.
I definitely can't party all night; I have to work tomorrow.
He hasn't gotten up yet, he must have been on the internet all night long last night.
I played cards all through the night last night. I'm so tired that I can't keep my eyes open.
Her brand new bicycle got stolen, she was heartbroken for a long time.
I broke dad's antique vase, he was upset for half the day.
Don't be too attached to that money. Once you've spent it you can earn more.
The minimum charge for a VIP booth is 2,000 RMB.
This restaurant is both delicious and economical. The average charge per person is about 50 RMB.
You have money but no time to buy. I, on the other hand, have time but no money to buy.
If I haven't returned by nine o'clock, my mom will start calling me on my cell phone non-stop.
When I am speaking, she is always smiling non-stop.
I just bought a new car, and the gas prices have been rising ever since. What luck.
I will control my feelings.
He keeps his monthly living expenses contained to about 1,000 RMB.
Eighty percent of the market is controlled by this company.
Yaaawn.
Why do you keep yawning? Did you get up early?
Nah, I went to bed super late, 4am.
You are quite the night owl, partying through the night. Did you go to the bars cruising for girls?
Hee-hee, yeah. Together with a group of buddies.
Oh, sounds quite interesting.
Yes it was, except I spent a ton of money. I gave my wallet a hurting.
Was there any minimum charge?
No minimum charge. Everybody had a blast. The girls kept urging me to drink, so I drank way too much.
You for sure got wasted again. You probably are still drunk.
Before I knew it I was drunk.
How did you get home? Did they bring you?
Nope. They were all hammered too. I got a cab myself. I fell asleep, and the driver somehow woke me up. Holy cow my head hurts.
Man, you have no concept of self-control.
